description: a representation of a set of businesses, one record per line, with no two records representing the same business, where each line is an object that is any of the following types

site_code.description: vendor-assigned business code, e.g. store code

names.description: a list of proper names for the business

alternate_names.description: a list of alternative names for the business

site_code.description: vendor-assigned business code, e.g. store code

names.description: a list of proper names for the business

alternate_names.description: a list of alternative names for the business

phoneNumberType_BE.description: a phone number with an optional type specification

addressChoice_BE.description: an address as a single string, or a structured address

structuredAddress_BE.description: an address with explicitly described pieces

businessStatus_default.description: the current status of a business. If status is Duplicate, correct_site_code must specify the site_code of the business of which this record is a duplicate. If status is Temporarily Closed, reopen_date should specify the date upon which the business will reopen; eventually an entry with status Open should be supplied to indicate the reopening.

categoriesType_default.description: a list of well-known categorizations for the business

countryCode_default.description: two or three alphabetical characters, or three digits

entryPoint_default.description: an entry point for a business, with a specified type of navigation for entry

entryPoints_default.description: one or more entry points for a business

geographicPoint_default.description: coordinates and origin of a point

name_default.description: a name paired with a locale

phoneNumber_default.description: ten to fifteen digits, with optional formatting characters and spaces

statusType_default.description: the status of this business. Moved indicates that the business' current values describe a business that has moved while retaining the same site_code. Other indicates that the business record is being removed for some other reason. Additional status types are described in businessStatus_default.

hoursOfOperation_default.description: hours of operation for a normal week, format follows http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:opening_hours
